scripts.tauri:build: tauri build --bundles app && cd src-tauri && bash scripts/create-localized-dmg.sh
scripts.tauri:build:appstore: npm run build:appstore && npm run post-build:localize-prebundle && cd src-tauri && cargo build --release --features appstore --no-default-features && cd .. && tauri build --config src-tauri/tauri.conf.appstore.json && npm run post-build:localize-pkg
scripts.post-build:localize-prebundle: cd src-tauri && bash scripts/add-localization.sh target/release/bundle/macos/CaoGit.app 2>/dev/null || echo 'App not built yet, will localize after build'
